Comment: It's not just that people like their escapism, it's supply and demand at a base level.  All sorts of young men and women out in the hinterlands that want to be movie stars/rich/famous and are willing to do things to make that happen.  There are many of them, and considerably fewer star making rolls, and even fewer people that control who gets those.  Those people build considerable power and so people in the business cover for them.  Jennifer Lawrence didn't want to go to college in Kentucky and work for some corporation, she wanted to be a STAR.  Sleeping with Harvey Weinstein made that happen.  Unlike some I think she actually has talent, but getting that talent seen might never have happened without taking the shortcut.
